businesses.name: KRS Consulting Group
businesses.business_details:
KRS Consulting Group was born in Torquay in 2000 with just Katrina working away at her desk. In the 20 years we have been operating, KRS Consulting Group has grown to become a team seven staff based in our Grovedale office. 

With the onset of CO-VID19 we have transitioned to an online format using Zoom. 

With our extensive experience in almost every business you could imagine, we have been making rainbows in businesses throughout Geelong and the Surf coast. Along with the help of our superb team we are ready to help any and all businesses to navigate this uncertain time. We are here for you!
businesses.product_details:
KRS Consulting Group offers superb assistance with programs such as Xero and
Quickbooks Online. We work with our clients to provide as much assistance as they
require, BAS lodgements or full service bookkeeping (processing of transactions, tills, bills
etc). Payroll is our specialty.
businesses.new_products: - Virtual Consultation and Training via Zoom and Teamviewer
businesses.headline: “Lives by the ocean, works in the cloud”
